itemInfo.itemDesc: Installing a Waterway in a Garden will reduce the amount of water consumed.\n(Right-click to display the closest Fence Exchange location)

item.name: Log
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Lumbering trees grown in every region.

item.name: Bottle of River Water
item.desc:
Water Gathered from a river using an Empty Bottle. It can be modified, or used as an ingredient in Crafting.
- How to Obtain: River Water can be obtained by using an Empty Bottle at a river.

â€» Pouring a Bottle of River Water on a Garden will increase the available Water Deposit.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.
